name: I Flew on a Humanitarian Aid Mission to Remote African Villages
description:
I was very kindly invited to ride along on a humanitarian aid mission in Kenya with Mission Aviation Fellowship (MAF)  to see the work they're doing to connect remote communities in Kenya and South Sudan at first hand.
